WAP.content: pose questions, pose or posit that which does not pose or posit itself, not-thetic? this alleged neutrality constructs teaching body > no question not constrained by a program
WAP.linkedContent: pose questions, pose or posit that which does not pose or posit itself, not-thetic? this alleged neutrality constructs teaching body > no question not constrained by a program

WAP.content: [speaking of teaching body] hear I am, the teaching body, in what way is this a glorious body? all light on me > it is also glorious because no longer a body: sublimated, at once part/whole of general teaching body, representative of philosophical/sociopolitical corpus
WAP.linkedContent: [speaking of teaching body] hear I am, the teaching body, in what way is this a glorious body? all light on me > it is also glorious because no longer a body: sublimated, at once part/whole of general teaching body, representative of philosophical/sociopolitical corpus

WAP.content: teaching body fascinates when it’s more than a center: its excentricity permits synoptic surveillance covering field of (indistinguishable) body taught & permits withdrawal, reserve, of body that does not surrender, offering itself from only one side [visor effect?]
WAP.linkedContent: teaching body fascinates when it’s more than a center: its excentricity permits synoptic surveillance covering field of (indistinguishable) body taught & permits withdrawal, reserve, of body that does not surrender, offering itself from only one side [visor effect?]

WAP.content: body becomes teaching and exercises mastery by a stratified erasure in front of/behind the corpus taught
WAP.linkedContent: body becomes teaching and exercises mastery by a stratified erasure in front of/behind the corpus taught

WAP.content: my body > cadaverization of my body, capturing by erasure, fascinating neutralization > my body only fascinates while playing dead, when erected in rigidity of cadaver (delegation of life)
WAP.linkedContent: my body > cadaverization of my body, capturing by erasure, fascinating neutralization > my body only fascinates while playing dead, when erected in rigidity of cadaver (delegation of life)

WAP.content: cadaverizing seduction: the simulacrum of erasure > negativity of death, removal (enlèvement) of writing, erosion of text/surface/textual marks
WAP.linkedContent: cadaverizing seduction: the simulacrum of erasure > negativity of death, removal (enlèvement) of writing, erosion of text/surface/textual marks

WAP.content: philosophy occurs in the place of this erosion, which is effect of refoulement, of a reactive bustle (d’un affairement réactive), and du même coup, this erasure is sublime annihilation of all characteristics of the face (facies) > effects that make one believe body has nothing to do w/ it (all is vocable/audible)
WAP.linkedContent: philosophy occurs in the place of this erosion, which is effect of refoulement, of a reactive bustle (d’un affairement réactive), and du même coup, this erasure is sublime annihilation of all characteristics of the face (facies) > effects that make one believe body has nothing to do w/ it (all is vocable/audible)

WAP.content: struggle for philosophy cuts through entire teaching body (teachers, students)
WAP.linkedContent: struggle for philosophy cuts through entire teaching body (teachers, students)

EU.content: double bind that knots around sublime body of “teacher of philosophizing” [i.e. philosophy eludes teaching, philosophizing requires it]: teacher haunts the scene, doesn’t dominate, or dominates like a ghost > one might say he fascinates/seduces if these connotations weren’t too closely tied to imagination/sensibility: for reason should break the charm [of sensibility?] [chaire vacant]
EU.linkedContent: double bind that knots around sublime body of “teacher of philosophizing” [i.e. philosophy eludes teaching, philosophizing requires it]: teacher haunts the scene, doesn’t dominate, or dominates like a ghost > one might say he fascinates/seduces if these connotations weren’t too closely tied to imagination/sensibility: for reason should break the charm [of sensibility?] [chaire vacant]
